title: Mira Showers Mira Sport Max Single Outlet Electric Shower 10.8KW
features: Experience the enhanced power of one of the UK’s best-selling electric showers, for over 30 years – now in dual outlet for more spray experiences, and patented Airboost technology to increase the water flow. Built around a host of Mira innovations that bring you a more powerful, longer lasting and better performing shower. Shaped by clean and contemporary style to make a modern design statement.
Patented Mira Airboost technology amplifies the power of the water flow by up to 30%, without using any extra water. So you can enjoy a more invigorating shower experience.
Flip between four new spray modes on the 120mm handset – ranging from full coverage to a powerful massage spray.
Separate power and temperature controls let you fine-tune your perfect shower experience. From a cool blast, to a hot soak – and every kind of shower in between.
The simple, push-button on/off offers quick and easy operation, while allowing you to keep your preferred power and temperature settings ready to go for your next shower.
description: From the manufacturer Unique spray experiences Flip between four new spray modes on the 120 mm handset – ranging from a gentle mist to a focused blast. Shower on demand The simple, push-button on/off offers quick and easy operation, while allowing you to keep your preferred power and temperature settings ready to go for your next shower. Re-energise. Refresh. Renew. Enjoy long-lasting, powerful performance – from one of the UK’s bestselling electric showers. Featuring a brand-new showerhead and a fresh, contemporary design. A seamless switch Thanks to the adjustable slide bar, it’s easy to cover fixing holes in walls or tiles from previous fittings – so you can upgrade to powerful Mira electric shower performance without compromising the look of your bathroom. More power, from thin air By infusing the water with air, your shower is transformed with Mira’s AirBoost Technology – creating a more powerful flow effect that re-energises body and mind, at the touch of a button. Separate power and temperature controls Separate power and temperature controls let you fine-tune your perfect shower experience. From a cool blast, to a hot soak – and every kind of shower in between. Built to last Mira Clearscale technology reduces the build-up of limescale by up to 50%. It means a longer lasting and better performing shower, as well as minimal cleaning.

specifications_table.Special Features: ‎Mira Clearscale™ technology features a unique heating element design helping to prevent the build-up of limescale inside the shower unit by up to 50% – ensuring a longer lasting and better performing shower., Mira Opti-flo™ technology optimises water flow throughout the year – adjusting to combat seasonal changes in your mains water temperature. So there’s less fiddling with settings., Thanks to the adjustable slide bar, it’s easy to cover fixing holes in walls or tiles from previous fittings – so you can upgrade to powerful Mira electric shower performance without compromising the look of your bathroom., Mira Sensi-flo™ technology monitors your shower’s water flow rate to detect blockages in the hose or showerhead – automatically shutting off the heating element to help prevent scalding from surges. So you can enjoy safer showering.
specifications_table.Included Components: ‎Mira Sport unit, Fittings, Quick Start Guide and Installation Guide
